articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: Verstappen: Red Bull "getting found out" by F1 rivals as gap closes - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Max Verstappen says his Red Bull Formula 1 team is "getting found out" by its rivals after qualifying sixth in Monaco with car handling issues.
articles.content:
Verstappen struggled throughout practice over the many kerbs and bumps around Monaco's tight street circuit.
And while the Red Bull team turned around its practice woes last week in Imola, there was… [+2100 chars]
